name: Tetris (itch) (Julien (Sorangon))
description:
Play Tetris again with 4 exclusives themes of games and movies references !

Arrows to move and spacebar to rotate.

This is a student project for the International Fair of Montpellier with the theme of 80s. Download the Android Application if you enjoyed !

We've made this Tetris version with a team of 4 people on 2 weeks. I worked as the main programmer and assets integrator in Unity Engine.
